Method Detail

learn

public void learn()
The function that does the "learning" for the adaline network. The delta rule changes the weight values by a percentage called the learning rate. The learning rate is used to adjust the weights of the links.

run

public void run()
A void function that runs the adaline network. This is the function that passes values through the transfer function.

Specified by:
run in interface IFeedForward

transferFunction

public double transferFunction(double value)
Function returns a -1 if the value passed to it is less than 0 and 1 otherwise.

Specified by:
transferFunction in interface IFeedForward
